programme.title: Weaponized
programme.desc: A damaged homicide detective (Johnny Messner) must prevent a grieving father from unleashing a "robotic virus" that he believes will destroy the terrorist cell that murdered his son, but at an unimaginable cost.

programme.title: Mexican Sunrise
programme.desc: Based on a true story. Five friends went to Mexico for a bachelor party. Not all of them made it to sunrise.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: Stones
programme.desc: A melodramatic story of a woman who desires to meet a husband at a quarry where ten men work. Marek Piaček composed the music based on the libretto of Mila Haugovás poems translated into English. Kamene (Stones) by director Katarína Kerekesová, was the winner at the Fano International Film Festival in Italy

programme.title: See You in September
programme.desc: See You in September is an original romantic comedy set in current day Manhattan. The film centers around Lindsay, a beautiful woman who seemingly has it all, but is deeply afraid of commitment. When she finds out that her therapist takes a vacation for the entire month of August she feels shocked and abandoned. Instead of taking this news lying down, Lindsay enlists the help of her acerbic best friend Monica to come up with a solution. With the assistance of "Craigs List", Lindsay puts together a group therapy session for all Manhattanites who are in need of therapy, but more importantly angry at their therapists for abandoning them.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: House of the Stone Monkeys
programme.desc: The action proceeds along two tracks and two time frames. We meet the boy, who lives with his mother in a Budapest apartment house, in the summer of 2012. Another boy is spending his vacation with his grandparents in the same building in the summer of 1982. The house unveils its mysterious secret to both of them.

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: Headwinds
programme.desc: Sarah tells Paul that she wants out of their marriage; the next day she disappears. A year later and Paul along with their children return to his childhood town to start anew after the loss of his wife and their mother.

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: Upon discovering that their town is up for sale, crafty Irish villagers scheme to raise the money to prevent the buy-out...

programme.title: The Magnificent Ambersons
programme.desc: The spoiled rotten and utterly unlikable rich kid George Amberson becomes horrified when his recently widowed mother rekindles her relationship with the wealthy Eugene Morgan, who she left decades earlier in order to marry Georges father. As George struggles to sabotage his mothers new romance, he must deal with his own romantic feelings for Morgans daughter and the consequences of his meddling as his once great family falls into ruin due to his machinations...

programme.title: The Recall
programme.desc: When five friends vacation at a remote lake house they expect nothing less than a good time, unaware that planet Earth is under an alien invasion and mass-abduction.

programme.title: When Do We Eat?
programme.desc: A familys Passover gets screwy after the patriarch unknowingly ingests a hit of Ecstasy.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss consternation.

programme.title: Deserter
programme.desc: Unlikely friends in a melting pot of confusion. Simon Murray fights for the French Foreign Legion. Pascal Dupont fights for himself. War torn men question honour, hope, morality...because you can desert everything...except yourself.

programme.title: Its a Perfect Night for Suicide
programme.desc: A comedy about a psychic who pretends to believe that magic exists, a gigolo who pretends to believe the psychic, an illusionist who pretends to be somebody else and a desperate woman who believes she will find true happiness in love... when shes dead. Lenka is a psychic who besides telling fortunes is great at depriving her clients of them, with the help of an extraordinary uncle-illusionist. The business flourishes until Lenkas most profitable client, a soulful Buddhist Yvonne, decides to commit suicide. She was jilted by the man of her dreams - Oscar. Whats more, Yvonne wants to leave a suicidal note, pointing to Lenka as the cause of all her misfortunes. Lenkas entire world falls apart. She must dissuade Yvonne from killing herself and in her desperation is ready to use all her magical skills to make Oscar fall in love with Yvonne. However, Lenka doesnt even suspect shes entering the lions den. A dangerous game begins. The full moon is on the rise - and, surprisingly, the magic starts to work for real. It turns out that the scenario written in the stars is not an easy thing to change...

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: Treasure Island
programme.desc: Young Jim Hawkins and Peg-legged Long John Silver set sail for adventure in Robert Louis Stevensons classic tale of dastardly pirates, swashbuckling heroes, buried treasure, and a young boys courage during the adventure of a lifetime.

programme.title: Train Master
programme.desc: 62 year old Jeremiah Wilson is truly the Train Master of Willamette Western Railroad. He lives, breaths, and eats railroad. When Brett Banner, 32 year old heir to New York Eastern talks his dad into purchasing Willamette Western, there is immediately a clash between himself and Jeremiah. Jeremiah is fired by Brett two years from retirement and turns into a angry, depressed grandfather. When Bretts nine year old son Justin realizes Jeremiahs grandson Thomas can drive a locomotive, he kidnaps and holds Thomas favorite dinosaur ransom. Justin, Thomas and 3 other children board an old engine in for repairs and accidentally turns it into runaway engine causing a chain reaction of events.

programme.title: Digging Into China
programme.desc: Harriet, a ten-year old girl, lives together with her big sister and her alcoholic mother out in the countryside. The family runs a motel. Harriet is different from the others, as she owns a great creativity and has nobody to play with. Her infinite world exists only in her mind. One day, Ricky comes along. He is a grown-up, but retarded son of an elderly lady. Soon, Harriet and Ricky share their experiences of life from a different point of view and become close friends. But his mother still plans to give Ricky away into professional care in a home, because she wont live forever to be there for him.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Kevin, Samantha and Rob live for Foolproof; their own private club where through high-tech, meticulously thought out and executed plans, they pull off the most impossible of heists - all in theory that is. Theyve never actually done it for real. But all that changes when Leo, a cutthroat British gangster, rips off their foolproof plans for a diamond heist and uses it to successfully execute the robbery. Threatening to implicate them, Leo blackmails them to pull off a robbery worth $20 million in corporate bonds.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Spooner
programme.desc: Facing eviction from his parents home on his 30th birthday, a socially awkward guy meets the girl of his dreams and creates his own rules for growing up.

programme.title: BloodRayne: The Third Reich
programme.desc: Rayne fights against the Nazis in Europe during World War II, encountering Ekart Brand, a Nazi leader whose target is to inject Adolf Hitler with Raynes blood in an attempt to transform him into a dhampir and attain immortality

programme.title: Prophets Game
programme.desc: The prophet has arrived in the ultimate playing ground... Los Angeles. He has taken an innocent childhood game and twisted it into a deadly match of wits, where the only prize is survival.

programme.title: Rītdienas karš
programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis ir izvēlēts cīnīties nākotnes karā, kurā cilvēces liktenis balstīts uz viņa spēju tikt galā ar pagātni.

programme.title: Tuvāk
programme.desc: No mīlestības mēs parasti atceramies kā tā sākās un kā - beidzās, un mēģinām atjaunot atmiņā kas īsti notika pa vidu. "Tuvāk" ir stāsts par četriem sākotnēji savstarpēji svešiem cilvēkiem, kurus satuvina acumirklīga iekāre. Nepārvaramajai kaislei seko neuzticība, jo viņi visi ir ļaudis, kuri tic mīlestībai no pirmā acu skatiena. Atkal un atkal.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Saulains velobrauciens cauri Lahemā.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Linkolns
programme.desc: ASV Pilsoņu karš tuvojas noslēgumam. Prezidents Ābrams Linkolns ir apņēmies panākt nozīmīga konstitūcijas labojuma pieņemšanu, lai uz visiem laikiem aizliegtu verdzību ASV. Tomēr laika to panākt ir maz, jo kuru katru brīdi karš var beigties. Ja tas notiks pirms labojuma pieņemšanas, dienvidu štati nepieļaus, lai tas iegūst likuma spēku. Izmantojot visus iespējamos līdzekļus, Linkolnam nepakļāvīgajā Kongresā jāiegūst pietiekami daudz balsis, pirms karš beidzas, un visas pūles izrādās veltas.

programme.title: Tuvāk
programme.desc: No mīlestības mēs parasti atceramies kā tā sākās un kā - beidzās, un mēģinām atjaunot atmiņā kas īsti notika pa vidu. "Tuvāk" ir stāsts par četriem sākotnēji savstarpēji svešiem cilvēkiem, kurus satuvina acumirklīga iekāre. Nepārvaramajai kaislei seko neuzticība, jo viņi visi ir ļaudis, kuri tic mīlestībai no pirmā acu skatiena. Atkal un atkal.

programme.desc: Kāds vīrietis ir izvēlēts cīnīties nākotnes karā, kurā cilvēces liktenis balstīts uz viņa spēju tikt galā ar pagātni.

programme.title: Linkolns
programme.desc: ASV Pilsoņu karš tuvojas noslēgumam. Prezidents Ābrams Linkolns ir apņēmies panākt nozīmīga konstitūcijas labojuma pieņemšanu, lai uz visiem laikiem aizliegtu verdzību ASV. Tomēr laika to panākt ir maz, jo kuru katru brīdi karš var beigties. Ja tas notiks pirms labojuma pieņemšanas, dienvidu štati nepieļaus, lai tas iegūst likuma spēku. Izmantojot visus iespējamos līdzekļus, Linkolnam nepakļāvīgajā Kongresā jāiegūst pietiekami daudz balsis, pirms karš beidzas, un visas pūles izrādās veltas.

programme.title: Vilciens uz Jumu
programme.desc: 19. gadsimta beigās Arizonā tiek sagūstīts dzelzceļa laupītāju bandas vadonis Bens Veids. Pilsoņu kara veterāns un rančo īpašnieks Dens Evanss piesakās nogādāt bīstamo slepkavu uz vilcienu, kas dosies uz Jūmu, kur noziedznieku gaida tiesa. Ceļā Evanss un Veids, kas katrs pārstāv ļoti atšķirīgas pasaules, iemanto viens otra cieņu. Taču Veida banda un uz katra soļa draudošās briesmas padara to par nežēlīgu un neiespējamu katra vīra ceļu pretī savam liktenim.

programme.title: Kreilis
programme.desc: Billija Houpa dzīvē viss bija nevainojami - čempiona tituls, skaista sieva un mīļotā meitiņa. Taču vienā brīdī viss apgriežas ar kājām gaisā - traģiskos apstākļos iet bojā viņa sieva, diskvalifikācija ringā, pēc kuras viņu pamet menedžeris, nekādu ienākumu un viņam tiek atņemtas vecāka tiesības. Lai atgūtu visu, kas Billijam ir bijis dārgs, viņam ir jaatrod spēki uzvarēt sava mūža grūtākajā...

programme.title: Maiņas beigas
programme.desc: Losandželosas ielas patruļas policisti Braiens un Maiks ir partneri, kas savā darbā nepazīst mērenību vai ierobežojumus. Viņu pārziņā ir ielas, kurās notiek latīņamerikāņu un melnādaino bandu asa un nežēlīga savstarpēja cīņa. Pāris reizes pāriniekiem paveicas, un viņi izjauc apjomīgus narkotiku un cilvēku tirdzniecības darījumus, tāpēc meksikāņu kartelis pasūta viņu slepkavības.

programme.title: Saikne
programme.desc: Stāsts par seržantu Kinliju, kurš savā pēdējā norīkojumā Afganistānā nonāk komandā ar vietējo tulku Ahmedu. Kad viņu vienību patruļas laikā aplenc, Kinlijs un Ahmeds ir vienīgie izdzīvojušie, un Ahmeds riskē ar dzīvību, nogādājot ievainoto Kinliju drošībā.

programme.title: Akimbo ieroči
programme.desc: Videospēļu izstrādātājs Mailzs ir pārāk aizrāvies ar uzkurinošu un dzēlīgu komentāru ievietošanu tīmeklī. Kādu vakaru viņš pieļauj kļūdu un dzērumā publicē skarbus vārdus par "Skizm" - nāves spēli, kas tiek straumēta tiešsaistē. Tāpēc Riktors, kanāla maniakālais autors, nolemj iesaistīt Mailzu šajā "jautrībā". Mailzs pamostas ar smagām pistolēm pie rokām un uzzina, ka izcilā šāvēja Niksa ir viņa pirmā pretiniece.

programme.title: Bēgšana no Šoušenkas
programme.desc: Filma ir par baņķieri Endiju Defrēnu, kam piespriesti divi mūža ieslodzījumi par sievas un viņas mīļākā nogalināšanu. Cietumā viņš sadraudzējas ar Elisu Boidu "Redu" Redingu, Defrēns jūtas drošībā pēc tam, kad viņa zināšanas finanšu nozarē izmanto cietuma darbinieki un ieslodzītie.

programme.desc: Trīsdesmitgadnieki Zoja un Kazims ir bērnības draugi un kaimiņi, un tagad katram no viņiem jāpieņem lēmums, vai sekot savam prātam vai sirdij. Kazims pieņem vecāku padomu un piekrīt sarunātām laulībām Pakistānā ar sievieti, ko nekad nav saticis.

programme.title: Grāmatu un kartupeļu mizu pīrāgu mīļotāju klubs
programme.desc: Pēckara Londonā jaunā rakstniece Džuljeta mēģina atrast sižetu savai nākamajai grāmatai, taču viņai galīgi negribas rakstīt par kara šausmām, bet citi temati šķiet vai nu garlaicīgi, vai nepiemēroti. Viņai palīdz nejaušs gadījums - vēstule no kāda Gērnsijas salas cūkkopja.

programme.title: Mana Māsīca Reičela
programme.desc: Filips ir jauns anglis, kura brālēns Ambrozs pēc došanās uz Florenci Itālijā nomirst. Viņš zvēr atriebību Ambroza sievai Reičelai, vainojot viņu visās nelaimēs.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: In the first battle, the chefs are tasked with creating cold dishes. Plus, one contender nearly burns down the House of Knives.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives

Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Owning and operating a restaurant is hard graft, harder than many believe it to be. Long hours, stiff competition, and no guarantees that customers will frequent; for many budding restaurateurs, the dream often turns into a nightmare. This American reality series follows English celebrity chef Robert Irvine as he attempts to save failing restaurants from the brink of collapse. With just two days to turn it around on a measly budget of $10,000, he gets to straight to work identifying and altering the businesses weaknesses before a grand re-opening. Can he achieve the seemingly impossible and create a food establish that is set to succeed?

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Anderson V. Voltaggio
programme.desc: A shocking ingredient demands that the captains step up their game. The Brawlers share a single piece of equipment to cook a nose-to-tail feast.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: In hour 16, the eight remaining chefs work in teams while handling three culinary curveballs to impress judges Carlos Anthony and Brian Malarkey.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Keepin It Capon. Mike Mazza, a project manager and home cook, is blown away when Eddie Jackson surprises him with a capon battle against world-renowned chef Rocco DiSpirito.

programme.title: Outchefd
programme.desc: Shell Shock. Home cook and entrepreneur Trent is stunned when Eddie Jackson gives them the chance to face off against celebrity chef Rocco DiSpirito. Will Trent wow the judges?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.desc: Michael Symon starts the day off with breakfast in the garden. He puts a twist on French toast, perfects the omelette and serves a summery drink.

programme.title: Best Baker in America
programme.desc: Cooking competition show in which professional and home bakers compete in a baking tournament. For six weeks, eight skilled bakers are challenged to use their style and technical abilities to make stunning, tasty treats and impress the judges - from macarons, fruit tarts, creme brulee to spectacular and elaborately-decorated cakes. One person gets eliminated every week by the panel of judges, until the final where the best three bakers compete for the grand prize of $25,000 and the title of Best Baker in America.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Ghost Town Gourmet. Robert Irvine heads to an abandoned mining town in Cerro Gordo, CA. He prepares a meal using the same ingredients and equipment as the miners had in 1865.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
The Last Day of the Dictator
Mīļumiņš
programme.desc: Filmas stāsta pamatā ir jauna aktiera vētrainā bērnība un jaunības gadi, mēģinājumi samierināties ar tēvu un tikt galā ar savu garīgo veselību.

programme.title: Ēdienkarte
programme.desc: Jauns pāris dodas uz nomaļu salu, lai apmeklētu izsmalcinātu restorānu, kurā tās šefpavārs ir sagatavojis mākslas darba cienīgu maltīti un atbilstošu pasniegšanu. Taču, lai mākslas darbs būtu neizmirstams, ir vajadzīgi arī kādi šokējoši pārsteigumi.

programme.title: Nozust 60 sekundēs
programme.desc: Cik daudz var paveikt 60 sekundēs? Izsmēķēt cigareti vai izdzert tasīti kafijas. Taču tikai viens profesionālis pasaulē –leģendārais zaglis Memfiss – dažu sekunžu laikā spēj aizdzīt jebkuru automobili. Šoreiz gan viņam nāksies paveikt burtiski neiespējamo. Lai glābtu savu brāli, Memfisam vienas nakts laikā jānolaupa 50 pirmklasīgas mašīnas. Lai izkļūtu no mafijas un policijas dubultslazda, viņam jāievēro tikai viens princips - nedrīkst apstāties...

programme.title: Mazais izmeklētājs
programme.desc: Reiz atzītais un slavenais mazulis izmeklētājs, kas nu ir kļuvis par 31 gadu vecu, taču dzīvē neveiksmīgu vīrieti, turpina mēģināt atrisināt dažādas triviālas mistērijas, šim arodam pieslēdzoties laika posmos starp paģirām un sevis žēlošanas sesijām. Kādā reizē naiva kliente līdz viņam nogādā kādu "pieaugušo" lietu. Tajā jāizdara kas tāds, ko mazais izmeklētājs līdz šim nav ne spējis, ne darījis – jānoskaidro, kas nogalinājis klienta draugu.

programme.title: Transformeri: Nezvēru laikmets
programme.desc: Spraigi piedzīvojumi un elpu aizraujošs specefektu vēriens ir aizrāvis "Transformers" filmu fanus visā pasaulē jau kopš pirmās filmas iznākšanas uz kinoekrāniem! Jaunākā filma "Transformeri: Nezvēru laikmets" aizvedīs skatītājus aizraujošā kino piedzīvojumā apkārt pasaulei 90. gados un iepazīstinās ar pilnīgi jauniem transformeriem – The Maximals. Cīņa starp Autobotiem un Maldikoniem norisināsies jaunā līmenī!

programme.title: Tauriņa stāsts
programme.desc: Tuvojoties ziemai, monarhu tauriņi migrē uz dienvidiem, lai pārziemotu siltumā. Taču Patrika spārni vēl nav gatavi tālajam ceļam un viņš nevar lidot. Nedomādams padoties, Patriks kopā ar savu labāko draugu kāpuru Mārtiju paslēpjas pārtikas treilerī, kuru velk Dženifera. Tomēr arī viņai ir savas bažas par ceļojumu, jo - tauriņam neierasti - viņu māc bailes no augstuma. Visus trīs gaida daudz piedzīvojumu un sūri gūtu mācību, līdz mērķis būs sasniegts.

programme.title: Trakās ķepas. Leģenda par Henku
programme.desc: Henks varbūt ir necils suns, taču viņš ir apņēmības pilns kļūt par samuraju. Suņuks dodas uz valsti, kur čum un mudž no kaķiem. Tur Henks satiek nejauko kaķu karavadoni Iku Ču un arī Džimbo, kurš reiz bijis varens samurajs. Džimbo paņem Henku savā paspārnē un iemāca viņam, ko īsti nozīmē būt samurajam. Dzimstot pirmajai īstajai draudzībai starp kaķi un suni, abiem nākas glābt Kakamučo no ļaunā Ika Ču.

programme.title: Ups! Piedzīvojumi turpinās
programme.desc: Uz Noasa šķirsta kļūst nemierīgi – kuģis pārāk ilgi kuģo pa jūru, zeme nav redzama un pārtikas krājumi sarūk arvien vairāk. Kādu dienu ceļotāji patiešām atklāj salu, taču uz tās ir aktīvs vulkāns, un arī salas iedzīvotāji nav visai viesmīlīgi.

programme.title: Teorija par visu
programme.desc: 20. gadsimta 60. gados Kembridžas Universitātes students un topošais fiziķis Stīvens Hokings iemīlas savā studiju biedrē Džeinā Vaildā. Kad Hokingam ir 21 gads, viņam konstatē motorā neirona slimību. Par spīti tam un ar Džeinas palīdzību viņš uzsāk ambiciozu laika izpētes projektu, lai gan puiša ārsts apgalvo, ka laika viņam ir atlicis ļoti maz. Spītējot nelaimei, Stīvens un Džeina izdara jaunus atklājumus medicīnā un zinātnē, sasniedzot vairāk, nekā abi bija spējuši iedomāties.

programme.title: Troļļi
programme.desc: Troļļi ir mazi un laimīgi radījumi, kuri savā pasaulē nodarbojas ar dziedāšanu, apskaušanos un būšanu laimīgiem. Tomēr viņu idilli mežā pārtrauc bergeni, kuri atklāj viņu atrašanās vietu un kuri ir milzu monstri, kas ir nepārtraukti nelaimīgi. Monstri atklāj, ka viņi var kļūt laimīgi, ja apēd troļļus. Troļļi glābjas, un viņus caur slepeniem tuneļiem vada karalis Pepijs. Pēc divām desmitgadēm Pepija meita Popija organizē izsmalcinātas svinības par godu tam, ka viņi ir izglābušies. Vientulīgais izdzīvošanas speciālists Zars pret to iebilst, jo uztraucas, ka troksnis varētu piesaistīt bergenus. Viņam izrādās taisnība, un bergeni nolaupa daudzus troļļus. Popija dodas glābšanas misijā, un Zars dodas viņai līdzi, jo neuzskata, ka Popija būs drošībā. Viņi ierodas Bergenu pilsētā, kur ierauga, kā Bergenu karalis apēd vienu trolli. Tomēr Popijas domas ir tādas, ka šis trollis tomēr ir izdzīvojis. Viņi atklāj, kur troļļus tur gūstā un kas tos uzrauga. To uzraudzītāja ir virtuves darbiniece Bridžita, kuru ir apbūris karalis. Viņa piekrīt atbrīvot ieslodzītos un ļaut Popijai un Zaram piekļūt karalim, ja viņai būs iespēja ar karali aiziet uz randiņu. Gatavojoties randiņam, Popija un Zars sastrīdas, jo Zars atsakās dziedāt, apgalvojot, ka dziedāšana nogalināja viņa vecmāmiņu, un šis notikums padarīja viņu pelēku. Bridžita tiek sapucēta kā lēdija, un viņa kopā ar karali dodas braukt ar skrituļslidām un uz restorānu. Troļļi tomēr nespēj Bridžitu pārvērst lēdijā uz visiem laikiem, un Bridžita sāk raudāt. Viņi mēģina izglābt troļļus, taču glābšanas laikā arī Popija tiek ieslodzīta. Popijai zūd cerības, un visi troļļi paliek pelēki. Zars sāk dziedāt un atzīsta mīlestībā. Visiem par pārsteigumu troļļiem atgriežas krāsas, arī Zaram. Troļļus taisās apēst, bet Bridžita viņus izglābj. Karalis un citi bergeni atklāj, ka viņiem troļļi nav jāapēd, lai kļūtu laimīgi. Troļļi un bergeni laimīgi sāk dzīvot saticīgi, un Popiju kronē par troļļu karalieni.

programme.title: Karalisks piedāvājums
programme.desc: Alana dzīve irst pa vīlēm – gan laulībā, gan biznesā iestājusies krīze, un viņam nav ne jausmas, kā dzīvot tālāk. Lai izbēgtu no bankrota un pārrautu neveiksmju loku, Alans dodas uz Saūda Arābiju – cerībā pārdot savu pārdrošo ideju moderno tehnoloģiju jomā pašam karalim. Gaidīdams vizīti, Alans iepazīst eksotiskās arābu pasaules noslēpumus, kam pa spēkam ir izmainīt viņa dzīvi. Gluži kā hologrammu…

programme.title: Karš par Pērtiķu planētu
programme.desc: Pērtiķu līderis Cēzars saskaras ar personīgu pārbaudījumu, jo viņam uzbrukušie cilvēku karavīri, kurus vada cietsirdīgais Pulkvedis, nogalina viņa tuviniekus. Cēzars ar savu inteliģento pērtiķu armiju stājas pretim cilvēkiem, kuri iznīcina viņu ģimenes. Ar primitīviem ieročiem bruņotās abu sugu armijas tiksies cīņā, kuras laikā tiks izlemts, kura suga kontrolēs Zemi nākotnē.

programme.title: Baltais puisis Riks
programme.desc: Riks Verše ir vientuļais tēvs, kurš nemitīgi cīnās, lai uzaudzinātu divus pusaudžus Detroitā pagājušā gadsimta 80. gados – laikā, kad tur valda narkotiku bums. Verše nelegāli tirgo ieročus, tā mēģinot savilkt kopā galus, taču drīz vien viņam pievērš uzmanību FIB. Federālie aģenti pārliecina Veršes dēlu Riku Junioru kļūt par narkotiku aģentu, pretī saņemot tēva brīvību. Kad jaunais Riks spēlē ieslīgst pārlieku dziļi, viņš pats kļūst par narkotiku dīleri.

programme.title: Skat, kā viņi bēg
programme.desc: Ir 1953. gads, un neilgi pēc Agatas Kristi lugas "Peļu slazds" 100. izrādes Londonas teātrī notiek šausminoša slepkavība. Upuris ir amerikānis - režisors Leo Koperniks. Pieredzējušais inspektors Stopards ir norīkots izskatīt lietu kopā ar konstebli Stalkeri. Jaunā policiste ar savu dedzību Stopardam drīz sāk krist uz nerviem. Tomēr pamazām abi nonāk līdz trim galvenajiem aizdomās turamajiem: scenāriste Mervina ar augstprātīgo režisoru karsti strīdējās, producentu Vulfu viņš šantažēja, bet aktieris Ričards Atenboro, iespējams, Kopernikam atriebās par uzmākšanos viņa sievai. Taču konsteble Stalkere ir pārliecināta, ka vainīgais ir neviens cits kā viņas priekšnieks Stopards!

programme.title: Kingsman: Slepenais dienests
programme.desc: Režisora Metjū Vona filma "Kingsman: Slepenais dienests", kuras pamatā ir godalgots komikss, vēsta par īpaši slepenu spiegu organizāciju, kas rekrutē savā nežēlīgas konkurences apmācību programmā neprasmīgu, taču daudzsološu ielaspuiku, jo pasauli apdraud jucis tehnoloģiju ģēnijs.

programme.title: Metāla skaņa
programme.desc: Pankmetāla bundzinieks un atlabstošs heroīna atkarīgais Rubens sāk novērot periodisku dzirdes zaudēšanu. Kad speciālisti izvērtē viņa stāvokli un viņš apjauš, ka tas tikai pasliktināsies, Rubens secina, ka mūzikas dzīve ir beigusies. Cenšoties nepieļaut atgriešanos vecajās sliedēs, viņa draudzene viņu aizved uz atturībnieku namu. Tur viņš tiek pieņemts tāds, kāds ir, un nu Rubenam jāizšķiras starp divām pilnīgi atšķirīgām dzīvēm.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.

programme.title: Minioni
programme.desc: Minjoni, kas attīstījās no dzelteniem vienšūnas organismiem, dzīvo uz Zemes kopš aizvēsturiskiem laikiem. Viņu dzīves jēga ir kalpošana, taču mazie radījumi nemitīgi atrod sev nekam nederīgus saimniekus, sākot no dinozaura un beidzot ar Napoleonu. Ja minjoniem nav saimnieka, kuram zemoties, viņi ieslīgst dziļā depresijā. Taču minjonam Kevinam ir plāns – kopā ar draugiem Stjuartu un Bobu viņš dodas meklēt jaunu ļauno saimnieku, kuram sekot. Tā viņi atrod Skārletu Nomušītu, kas ir pasaulē pirmā superļaundare.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Grū ģimenē ir papildinājums - Grū juniors. Kad tētis Grū sastopas ar jaunu ienaidnieku – atriebīgo Maksimu Lemālu un viņa liktenīgo sievieti Valentīnu –, visa ģimene ir spiesta atstāt mājas, doties uz slepeno mītni skaistajā Meifloverā un mēģināt iekļauties vietējā sabiedrībā zem slepena vārda. Taču te ir kāds, kas zina, kas patiesībā ir Grū, un piedzīvojumi var sākties!

programme.title: Ella un melnais Jaguārs
programme.desc: Pēc daudziem gadiem, kas pavadīti Ņujorkā, 14 gadus vecā Ella atgriežas Amazones lietus mežā, lai glābtu savu bērnības ciematu un mīļoto jaguāru draugu.

programme.title: Suns un kaķis
programme.desc: Kaķis un suns izbēg no būriem lidostā, un viņu īpašniekiem jāsadarbojas, lai atgūtu savus vērtīgos mājdzīvniekus.

programme.title: Džungļu patruļa: Operācija "Atkusnis"
programme.desc: Kad noslēpumains supernelietis pārklāj džungļus ar toksiskām rozā putām, kas eksplodē saskarē ar ūdeni, Džungļu grupai tiek lūgta palīdzība. Ar mazāk nekā mēnesi līdz lietus sezonai sākas sacensības ar laiku.

programme.title: Dzīve
programme.desc: Šī ir filma par kādu parastu vīrieti, kuru gadiem ilgi nomākusī biroja rutīna novedusi līdz eksistencei ēnā. Tā dēļ vienpadsmitajā stundā viņš pieliek vislielākās pūles, lai pārvērstu savu garlaicīgo dzīvi par kaut ko brīnišķīgu.

programme.title: Ātrs un bez žēlastības
programme.desc: Jauns policists uzņemas veikt slepenu operāciju un iefiltrējas sacīkšu braucēju komandā, lai izmeklētu dārglietu laupīšanu. Vispirms cenšoties iekarot komandas vadoņu uzticību, viņš nonāk briesmās, un pārējos komandas locekļos mostas aizdomas par viltvārdi viņu rindās. Sadursme ir neizbēgama.

programme.title: Abigeila
programme.desc: Ļaundaru grupa nolaupa ietekmīga noziedzīgās pasaules pārstāvja 12 gadus veco meitu baletdejotāju. Viņu mērķis ir paturēt meiteni ieslodzījumā uz vienu nakti, lai tiktu pie 50 miljonu dolāru lielas izpirkuma maksas. Taču mājā, kurā viņi ir apmetušies, notiek savādas lietas - cits pēc cita pazūd nolaupītāji, un ar pieaugošām šausmām viņi atklāj, ka ir ieslēgti kopā ar kādu, kas nav tipiska maza meitenīte.

programme.title: Pārdozēšana
programme.desc: Filmas notikumi seko Sārai, Tulūzas narkotiku apkarošanas grupas vadītājai, un Ričardam, vietējās kriminālpolicijas bosam. Sāra spiesta sadarboties ar Ričardu, lai apturētu metamfetamīna tirgošanu starp Spāniju un Franciju un atrastu slepkavu, kas saistīts ar šo lietu.

programme.title: Runā sievietes
programme.desc: Neko nedari, paliec un cīnies vai aizej. 2010. gadā attēlotie notikumi stāsta par izolētā reliģiskā kopienā dzīvojošām sievietēm, kuru ticība sastopas ar brutālu apmetnes vīriešu apiešanos.

programme.title: Labs cilvēks
programme.desc: Elisones dzīve apgriežas kājām gaisā, pēc tam kad viņa iekļūst nāvējošā negadījumā.

UFC. Roman Dolidze-Anthony Hernandez
programme.desc: Martial Arts based TV programme. UFC stands for the Ultimate Fighting Championship which is an American mixed martial arts (MMA) promotion company based in Las Vegas that is owned by William Morris Endeavour.The purpose of UFC fighting was to establish the most effective martial art in a contest that had no weight classes and minimal rules that were as follows: no biting, hair pulling, groin shots and eye gouging. Legendary fighters well known for their ability to win in UFC fighting are Anderson Silva, Brock Lesnar, Connor McGregor and Ken Shamrock. Womens MMA has seen Ronda Rousey defend her title from 2012 to 2015 before she was defeated by Holly Holm another belt holder in more than one martial art.

programme.title: WRC. Somija. Apskats
programme.desc: Welcome to the Finnish forests in Central Finland and get all the adrenaline action and cutting edge stories from Rally Finland. Top athletes take part in the rally competition and thousands of fans from all over the world watch the fastest event in the World Rally Championship, which is also one of the biggest public events in the Nordic countries.

programme.desc: All the action and cutting edge stories directly from the Cincinnati Masters, also called the Western and Southern Open for sponsorship reasons, the annual outdoor hardcourt tennis event held in Mason near Cincinnati, Ohio.

Regbijs: Lions Tour. Wallabies - The Lions
Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.title: Pool Kings
programme.desc: Well-do-to clients wishing for their own slice of paradise in their very back yard. Sounds like a job for the pool kings. Dramatic, in-ground pools with water features, decorative extras, outdoor kitchens and yes, even mini water parks. Innovative and outlandish designs, courtesy of California Pools, one of the largest pool builders in the U.S, and Tennessee-based Peek Pools and Spas bring the latest trends and modern features of back yard pools.

programme.title: Pool Kings

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: After creating their renovated bedroom in the Bell Tower, Daphne and Ian transform a water-damaged room into a bathing chamber worthy of royalty.

programme.title: Home Town
programme.desc: In this home improvement show, watch Ben and Erin Napier renovate old dulling houses in Mississippi, USA to dream homes. The pair are hoping to share their love of the small, historic homes of the town, and also transfer the enthusiasm of renovating a place to other home buyers. But can issues arise with the home replenishments. Since all the houses are extremely old, Ben and Erin do face problems ensuring the house dont get damaged when they work on them, and also that they can keep up with their original up to scratch plans. All the meanwhile they both ensure the homes are renovated at a low budgeted rate. Are they able to create beautiful homes for the people of Mississippi without damaging the infrastructure of the house too much? This fun-loving reality series has been running since 2016.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: Rico To the Rescue
programme.desc: A couples plan to renovate their basement turns disastrous after they hire a friend who abandons the job. Rico steps in to complete the project.

programme.title: Rico To the Rescue
programme.desc: After a year of renovating their basement, a couples relationship with their contractor has turned sour. Rico brings in his team to get them back on track.

programme.title: Christina on the Coast
programme.desc: Christina on the Coast is an American home renovation TV series featuring Christina Anstead, an American real estate investor and TV personality. The series premiere focuses on Anstead renovating her new home following her divorce with Tarek El Moussa, with whom they hosted Flip or Flop show. The remaining seven episodes presents her fixing up other peoples homes in Southern California. She puts a greater emphasis on design, which is her favorite part of the house-flipping process and she is happy to be able to create a space people have dreamed of.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU
programme.desc: Follow an array of Hollywood superstars as they embark on an exciting and heart-warming mission, expressing their gratitude to the most important people in their lives by surprising them with huge and incredible home renovations. There to help them on their adventure are twin brothers Drew and Jonathan Scott. Some of the amazing people featured on the programme are Rebel Wilson, Bred Pitt, Jeremy Renner, Michael Buble, Allison Janney, LeAnn Rimes, Kevin Hart, and many others.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A couple and their two children search for their dream log cabin near Boone, North Carolina. They want three bedrooms and mountain views.

programme.title: Log Cabin Living
programme.desc: A newlywed couple from Texas search for a rustic log cabin in northern Kentucky. They want an open-concept property with acreage for horse riding.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home International
programme.desc: A spin-off of My Lottery Dream Home that follows British interior designer Laurence Llewelyn-Bowen as he tries to help a number of lottery winners from Europe find a perfect home. Dive into the exciting world of real estate, and join Laurence as he travels across the United Kingdom and Europe looking for amazing properties for his clients - from castles, mansions, to cottages, and much more.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: Battle on the Beach
programme.desc: Three skilled teams hit the beach to renovate identical beachfront properties. With some help from Ty Pennington, Alison Victoria and Taniya Nayak, theyll compete to wow the judges with their home remodels and walk away with a $50,000 cash prize!

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina get the hands on a rarity - an inner-city, ranch-style home in the Whittier, California. They must create a must have property for any horse owner!

programme.title: Vintage Flip
programme.desc: Jessie and Tina Rodriguez take their passion for vintage homes to the next level. They find and buy historic homes to restore and sell at a profit.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Whats Wrong With That House?

programme.title: Build Me Up
programme.desc: Forgetting your ex isnt so easy when your whole house reminds you of them. Everywhere you turn, theres that horrible wall paper they insisted on getting, pictures of your holidays together, they even painted your front door their favourite colour. Thats where designer Orlando Soria comes in. Orlando considers himself somewhat a break-up expert, and hes determined to give these newly single clients houses the new lease of life that they so desperately need, allowing them to move on from their ex.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: Ancient Astronaut theorists Giorgio Tsoukalos, William Henry, and Jason Martell reveal the most compelling evidence of ancient flying machines and explore the possibility that these extraterrestrial encounters have persisted throughout the ages.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum are ready to wrangle some wild deals in the Lone Star State. Along the way, the guys test-drive a 1968 Buick Riviera, become riveted by a blacksmiths anvil collection, and meet up with NFL legend, Emmitt Smith.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. The crews must first win the right to ship the items by bidding on uShip, an online auction house that is one of the largest of its kind in the world. Once they have won the contract, they prepare the items for shipping, which is often easier said than done. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.desc: Did a fisherman capture footage of a giant sea serpent known as "Caddy?" Whats the explanation for the mysterious blue and green flashing lights, witnessed by hundreds of people, in Lubbock, Texas in August of 1951?

programme.title: Shipping Wars
programme.desc: Groups of independent shippers compete with each other in this American reality series, as they bid for the right to haul unconventional items that many conventional carriers deem unfeasible to transport. The crews must first win the right to ship the items by bidding on uShip, an online auction house that is one of the largest of its kind in the world. Once they have won the contract, they prepare the items for shipping, which is often easier said than done. The crews performances are scrutinised throughout, and their operational abilities are pushed to their limits as they transport both bizarre and tricky shipments across the country.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum head to the heart of the Bluegrass State. In Lexington, Kentucky, the team brings a 41 Ford Coupe Deluxe roaring back to life, and legendary Coach John Calipari assists with a University of Kentucky basketball collection.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: In Storage Wars show a team of professional buyers will prove that for a good buy you need more than certain sum of money. When rent is not paid on a storage locker for a certain period, the contents can be sold as a single lot of items in the form of an auction. The best experts are fighting for containers contents, hundreds of thousands of dollars are sometimes in the game. Every participant has only some minutes to inspect the contents, and that only without entering the storage room, just looking inside. Each purchase can become a win or a loss, and nobody knows exactly whether they are buying real treasures or garbage.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Pawn Stars reality show is about every day routine at Gold and Silver Pawn Shop based in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is a family business, three generations of Harrison family are buying and then selling unique objects that are of considerable historical, artistic or other cultural value. The main purpose is to make a profit which means separate the wheat from the chaff, have a keen scent for one-of-a-kind authentic items and recognize fake stuff as well as appraise items value flawlessly. It is absolutely breath-taking to watch the Harrisons run their shop, it is a mixture of psychological skills and business activity. Who would have thought that this ordinary, at first glance, job could be so jaw-droppingly fascinating.

programme.title: The Curse of Oak Island
programme.desc: The Curse of Oak Island is an active reality television series that focuses on the Oak Island mystery. There are numerous mystical stories of buried treasure and unexplained objects on or near this enigmatic island in Nova Scotia. Since the 19th century several attempts have been taken to locate treasure and artifacts there, some people even lost their lives trying to read this riddle. The Lagina brothers, Rick and Marty, were so impressed by this legend that they decided to try their luck and start this dangerous mission with the help of modern technologies and machinery. They are hammering at finding whatever is there, hidden deep under the ground, taking no notice of the fact that so far not even one research has ended up successfully.

programme.title: WWII in Colour: Road to Victory
programme.desc: 1942. Nazi Germanys Blitzkrieg enters Egypt. Field Marshal Erwin Rommel, aka the Desert Fox, has his eyes set on Cairo, but first he must overcome General Bernard Montgomery, the British Eighth Army, and the areas punishing fighting conditions.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Series in a documentary style focuses on hypothesis that historical texts, archaeological evidence and legends of different nations contain facts of past human-extraterrestrial contact. More than once everything unusual and most unbelievable have eventually turned out to be real. So this version can be fairly realistic- intelligent life forms from other galaxies visited the Earth millions years ago. They brought most advanced game-changing technologies, that changed the course of history. It makes us think again about the descent of man and modern progress of humankind. Strange drawings have been found in the caves, portraying runways in Peru and Indian texts have been deciphered, describing "flying machinery", called gods.

programme.title: The Secret of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: Rivaling the famous Area 51 in Nevada for UFO sightings and paramormal activity, is the lesser known, but equally fascinating, Uinta Basin in Utah and, in particular, Skinwalker Ranch. For the first time, a team of scientists and experts have been granted unlimited access to the infamous and secretive 512-acre property in order to unlock the mysteries of more than 200 years of UFO activity, bizarre animal mutations and preternatural phenomena. Making good use of state-of-the-art tecnology such as drone thermography, ground-penetrating radar and lasers, the team apply their knowledge and expertise to make shocking discoveries.

programme.title: Hunting History with Steven Rinella
programme.desc: Steve investigates the 1972 disappearance of the Begich/Boggs flight, a case that sparked the largest search in Alaskas history. Using his expertise in Alaskas unforgiving terrain, he explores the mystery through a fresh lens.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Non-fiction series explores all kinds of mysterious things and objects, hosted by William Shanter. William draws viewers attention to numerous enigmatic things in our life- unexplainable events, bizarre rituals, strange creatures, things of the mind, evil places. There are stories about deadly forests and mountains from where people do not return, voodoo and exorcism, premonitions that come true, and hosts favorite story about a man who starts to play the piano like a concert pianist after emergence from coma.
